Thurgam Lamesombre, Master of the battlefield, Assassin of kings (fighter 8 / rogue 3 / assassin 29)


Backstory

Thrugram Lamesombre is a crual, brutal, smart and evil Duergar. During his young years, he was the slave of a drow priestess dedicated to Zinzerena. At the begining, Thrugram was employed as a gladiator in the pit of Y'me Asari, a medium drow city. Thrugram was always victorious, battle after battle, even against strong drow ennemis. He was strong and a master of the battlefield, able to win a regular dual, with sword and muscle, or to disarm, disable, backstab and trap his strongest ennemies with his spectacular understanding of battle.
The drow priestess of Zinzerena decided to better use Thrugram Lamesombre special skills and initiated him to the dark secrets of Zinzerena’s assassins. He became, after years, the main and favorite assassin at the service of the priestess, better considered by the priestess than most drow males. Thrugram became more and more coldly brutal, blood thirsty… He tasted much drow blood under the orders of the priestess… until he bettrayed  and killed her. He managed to escape the drows, and then to reach the surface.
At the surface, he embrassed carriers of thief, mercenary, and pillard and discovered the thrist for gold. He was always deloyal and greedy, he betrayed or killed most of his allies. He finaly allied himself with a band of greedy dwarf mercenaries, devoted to Abbathor, the dwarf god. He’s now fighting deloyal and brutal on battlefields for some human kings, against tons of gold. Sometimes, he’s recruited to murder a king or a noble. He’s now one of the most feared assassin and soldier of the human kingdoms.

------
Lamesombre is a very offensive character (34 strength, 2 handed, 19d6 sneak attack), with low defenses. His defense is simple : to kill fast and before to be killed / to disable his ennemies (death attack paralysis, IKD for the immune ones and the wizards, called shot, improved disarm). He’s very versatile (lot of feats, lot of skills, UMD, etc.).
